alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Surry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 4:17PM EDT until July 08 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Isle of Wight County in southeastern Virginia... Southeastern Surry County in southeastern Virginia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elberon, or near Surry, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Smithfield around 450 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rushmere, Pons, Chippokes State Park, Bethel Church, Ellis Fork, Delk Crossroads, Lawson, Bacons Castle, Comet and Poolesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
